text: 200 Cigarettes is a 1999 American comedy-drama movie. The movie is about a party in New York City on New Year's Eve 1981. Martha Plimpton plays Monica. Courtney Love plays Lucy. Christina Ricci plays Val. Janeane Garofalo plays Ellie. Kate Hudson plays Cindy. The movie got negative reviews from critics. == Other websites == * Category:1999 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in the 1980s
title: 200 Cigarettes
